about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce My Demonic Romance Supporter pack.
It is a bundle of bonus goodies for the fans who want to go take things further in supporting us developers.

More stuff will be added to the supporter pack as time goes by (noticeably in the Walkthrough Guide as the game is going to completion).
My Demonic Romance Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
- Walkthrough Guide
- Various wallpapers

This list will expand little by little so stay tuned for more goodies!
Thanks everybody from the bottom of our hearts for your wonderful support.
Andrealphus Games

content_descriptors.notes:
- Violence and use of alcohol
- Religious themes
- BDSM and swinging/sharing
- Depiction of sex scenes between supernatural beings and humans.

  • Storage: 5 MB available space
